article_title: Paul Ryan as Speaker: A Preview of the Fights He Will Face, in Plain English
article_text: Not acquiesce to a continuing resolution Translates to → Shut down the government

twitter.description: The Freedom Caucus has a long list of things they would like from the next speaker of the House, but they are difficult for normal people to understand. Here, we translate them into plain English.
twitter.title: Paul Ryan as Speaker: A Preview of the Fights He Will Face, in Plain English
